title: Hifuu Katsudou Kiroku: The Sealed Esoteric History
title_english: Hifuu Club Activity Record: The Sealed Esoteric History
title_japanese: 秘封活動記録 The Sealed Esoteric History
synopsis: Based on Team Shanghai Alice's Touhou Project. History revolves around the many events in the lives of two students from the Outside World - Maribel Hearn and Renko Usami. They are the only members of the "Hifuu Club Activity Record" who are looking for those hidden worlds as Gensokyo, the Netherworld and the Moon. (Source: AniDB)

Alternative setting.name: Touhou Niji Sousaku Doujin Anime: Musou Kakyou

opening_themes: "Farewell Tour (決別の旅)" by Yonder Voice
ending_themes: #1: "Bouquet of Starry Skies (星空の花束)" by Yonder Voice (ep 1)
#2: "The Song of The Wind (風の唄)" by RD-Sounds (ep 2)
